short_summary: Delivery of potable water treatment equipment, installation by Parks Canada plumbers and electricians.
description: Potable water treatment equipment and offloading to Wabasso Campground in Jasper National Park.
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Title
Potable Water Treatment Equipment

### Solicitation Number
WS3786956252

### Tender Number
5P423-220178

### Publication Date
26 January 2023

### Tender Closing Date
22 February 2023 at 14:00 EST

### Amendment Number
3

### Expected Contract Start Date
28 February 2023

### Expected Contract End Date
1 April 2023

### Scope
Parks Canada is seeking a bid for the supply, delivery, and offloading of potable water treatment equipment to Wabasso Campground in Jasper National Park. The equipment will be installed by Parks Canada plumbers and electricians.

### Trade Agreements
Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Region
Alberta

### Procurement Category
Goods and Services (GD)

### Notice Type
Request for Proposal (RFP)

### Procurement Method
Competitive - Open Bidding

### Selection Criteria
The bid will be awarded based on the lowest price.

### Contracting Entity
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Contact Information
For more information, please contact Erin Kaiser at erin.kaiser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Tender Description
Parks Canada requires the supply, delivery, and installation of potable water treatment equipment at the Wabasso Campground in Jasper National Park. All supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 20 February 2023 at 14:00 EST. Any bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

### Important Notice
The tender closing date has been amended. Please disregard the original closing date and time posted on Ariba Discovery and Buyandsell. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 20 February 2023 at 14:00 EST.  Please visit the following link to access the tender document: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15237704?extsite=MTUyMzc3MDRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15237704?extsite=MTUyMzc3MDRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)  [Attachements] None. I beep boop.
